import React from 'react'; import cardLogo from '../Images/Circles.png' import './CardDetails.scss'; export default function CardDetails() { const cardData = [ { cardId : 1 , bank : "Purity UI" , cardNumber : "781221390823XXXX" , cardExpiry : "05/24" , cardCVV : "09X"} ] const cardLoop = cardData.map(data) return ( <>

{cardData[0].bank}

{cardData[0].cardNumber.split("-")}
VALID THRU

{cardData[0].cardExpiry}

CVV

{cardData[0].cardCVV}

) }
